p: Toxoplasma gondii is an intracellular parasite that causes many symptoms, such as encephalitis and congenital disorders. Using MTT (3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2â€“5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide) cell-proliferation assay in vitro, it was concluded that M. vulgare could be very useful against this parasite [ 100].
